segments.text: Sam , what shall I do with my stocks ? Will I lose money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean by that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean if you don ’ t sell your shares now , it ’ s quite likely that you ’ ll end up losing your shirt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . Take my word for it .
segments.speaker: S2
